bibl.title: State of Nebraska Department of Trade and Commerce Bureau of Insurance Summary of Insurance Business in Nebraska for the year 1926

respStmt.name: OCLC Online Computer Library Center Inc.

p.seg: State of Nebraska Department of Trade and Commerce Bureau of Insurance Summary of Insurance Business in Nebraska for the year 1926 Also Comparative Figures of Authorized Companies for the Years 1923, 1924, and 1925

To His Excellency: Hon. Adam McMullen, Governor. We herewith submit the summary of business of companies authorized to write insurance in this State for the year ending December 31, 1926, inclnding the names of companies organized, admitted, reinsured, withdrawn, examined, etc., during the year, also deposit of securities of domestic companies. DEPARTMENT OF TRADE AND COMMERCE. JOHN R. DUMONT, Insurance Commissioner. CLARENCE G. BLISS, Secretary.

COMPANIES ORGANIZED IX NEBRASKA IX 193tt American Thrift Assurance Company, Omaha, Nebraska. Writes life insurance. Cosmopolitan Thrift Association, Lincoln, Nebraska. Writes life insurance. Home Guardian Life Insurance Company, Lincoln, Nebraska. Writes life insurance. Midwest Lumbermen's Inter-Insurance Exchange, Lincoln, Nebraska Writes fire and tornado. National Co-operative Hail Association, Omaha, Nebraska. Writes hail insurance. United Benefit Life Insurance Company, Omaha, Nebraska Writes life insurance.

NEBRASKA INSURANCE REPORT 5 COMPANIES OP OTHER STATES ADMITTED IN 1926 Central Surety & Insurance Corp. Kansas City, Mo. Writes Liability and compensation, accident & health, auto colli- sion and property damage and teams property damage, plate glass, burglary, fidelity and surety. Connecticut General Life Ins. Co., Hardford, Conn. Writes lite, health and accident. Continental Life Ins. Co. St. Louis, Mo. Writes life, health and accident. Farmers Union Mutual Life Ins. Co., Des Moines, Iowa. Writes life insurance. General Insurance Co. of America, Seattle, Wash Writes fire, inland marine, earthquake, fidelity and surety, sprinkler leakage, motor vehicle. Implement Dealers Mutual Fire Ins. Co., Grank Forks, N. D. Writes tire, lightning and tornado. International Insurance Co. New York City, N. Y. Writes fire and marine. John Hancock Mutual Life Ins. Co., Boston, Mass. Writes life insurance. Michigan Millers Mutual Fire Ins. Co., Lansing Mich Writes fire insurance. National Implement Mutual Ins. Co., Owatonna, Minn. Writes fire, lightning, tornado and windstorm. National Union Indemnity Co., Pittsburg, Pa. Writes accident, health, noncancellable accident and health, auto liability, liability other than auto, workmen's compensation, fidelity, surety, plate glass, burglary and theft, steam boiler, engine and machinery, auto property damage, auto collision and property damage and collision other than auto. Saint Paul Mercury Indemnity Co. of Saint Paul, Wilmington, Del. Writes fidelity and surety. Security Life Ins. Co. of America, Richmond, Va. Writes life, health and accident. Stuyvesant Ins. Co., New York City, N. Y. Writes fire and marine. Transcontinental Ins. Co., New York City, N. Y. Writes fire Insurance. Victory Life Ins. Co., Topeka, Kas. Writes life insurance.

6 NEBRASKA INSURANCE REPORT COMPANIES THAT REINSURED, CHANGED NAME, WITHDREW, ETC., IN 1926 Brotherhood of Locomotive Firemen and Enginemen. Cleveland, Ohio, license not issued in 1926. Brotherhood of Kailroad Trainmen, Cleveland, Ohio, license not issued in 1926. Farmers Storm and Tornado Insurance Association of Madison, Pierce. Wayne. Stanton and adjoining counties changed to Farmers Tornado Insurance Association, March 27, 1926. Great American Insurance Company, Lincoln, Nebraska, liquidated in 1926. Integrity Mutual 1 Casualty Company, Chicago, 111., placed in hands or receiver June 2, 1926. Ladies Auxiliary to the Brotherhood of Kailroad Trainmen, Columbus Ohio, license not issued in 1926. National Retail Lumber Dealers Inter-Insurance Exchange, Chicago, 111., reinsured in Indiana Lumbermen's Mutual Ins. Co., Dee. 31, 1926. Sterling Fire Insurance Co. of Indianapolis, Iiid., placed in hands of receiver June 12, 1926, and reinsured in Hartford Fire. Union Reserve Life Ins. Co., Omaha Nebraska, consolidated with Northwestern Life Ins. Co. of Omaha, Nebraska in 1926. United States National Life and Casualty Company, Chicago, 111., changed name to Washington Fidelity National Ins. Co., March 31, 1926. Women's Benefit Association of the Maccabees changed name to Wo - man's Benefit Association December 8, 1926.
